sourcesContent:
import { neonCursor } from 'https://unpkg.com/threejs-toys@0.0.8/build/threejs-toys.module.cdn.min.js';

const canvas = document.createElement('canvas');
canvas.id = 'neon-canvas'; // Assurez-vous d'utiliser un ID unique
document.getElementById('app2').appendChild(canvas); // Ajoutez le canvas à #app2

neonCursor({
  el: canvas,
  shaderPoints: 16,
  curvePoints: 80,
  curveLerp: 0.5,
  radius1: 5,
  radius2: 30,
  velocityTreshold: 10,
  sleepRadiusX: 100,
  sleepRadiusY: 100,
  sleepTimeCoefX: 0.0025,
  sleepTimeCoefY: 0.0025
});
